35 // Structure BallAndSocketJointInfo
40 struct BallAndSocketJointInfo : public JointInfo {
41 
42  public :
43 
44  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
45 
47  bool isUsingLocalSpaceAnchors;
48 
50  Vector3 anchorPointWorldSpace;
51 
53  Vector3 anchorPointBody1LocalSpace;
54 
56  Vector3 anchorPointBody2LocalSpace;
57 
59 
65  BallAndSocketJointInfo(RigidBody* rigidBody1, RigidBody* rigidBody2,
66  const Vector3& initAnchorPointWorldSpace)
67  : JointInfo(rigidBody1, rigidBody2, JointType::BALLSOCKETJOINT),
68  isUsingLocalSpaceAnchors(false),
69  anchorPointWorldSpace(initAnchorPointWorldSpace) {}
70 
72 
78  BallAndSocketJointInfo(RigidBody* rigidBody1, RigidBody* rigidBody2,
79  const Vector3& anchorPointBody1LocalSpace,
80  const Vector3& anchorPointBody2LocalSpace)
81  : JointInfo(rigidBody1, rigidBody2, JointType::BALLSOCKETJOINT),
82  isUsingLocalSpaceAnchors(true),
83  anchorPointBody1LocalSpace(anchorPointBody1LocalSpace),
84  anchorPointBody2LocalSpace(anchorPointBody2LocalSpace) {}
85 };

151  BallAndSocketJoint& operator=(const BallAndSocketJoint& constraint) = delete;
152 };
153 
154 // Return the number of bytes used by the joint
155 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE size_t BallAndSocketJoint::getSizeInBytes() const {
156  return sizeof(BallAndSocketJoint);
157 }
